Package dao.services.implementations.accounts

Class HandlerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.services.implementations.accounts.HandlerService
  • class HandlerService
extends java.lang.Object
    Services class which helps to avoid duplicate codes. Used AccountServiceImpl, CheckingAccountServiceImpl and SavingAccountServiceImpl
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    Ruslan Pipan

      • removeAccount

        protected boolean removeAccount​(Account account,
                                java.lang.String SQL_TABLE)
        Removing account via JDBC transaction, because some type accounts have own table in DB and general, for that removed need delete two records with different tables.
        Parameters:
        account - which needs to remove.
        SQL_TABLE - SQL query with a specific table.

      • transaction

        protected boolean transaction​(Account accountFrom,
                              Account accountTo,
                              double awt)
        Transaction.
        Parameters:
        accountFrom - the account from witch money will be withdraw
        accountTo - the account to which the money comes.
        awt - amount of money.
